technicalSummary: Corrugated and flat wall tank manufacturing
Leak-tightness focused welding process and surface preparation
Forming, panel dimension and geometry verification
Welded panel joining with continuity-focused process control
Thickness and tolerance approach based on project type
Flanges, brackets and auxiliary metal parts
Manufacturing aligned with project drawings and revisions
Chassis and enclosure fabrication for oil purification equipment
Connection points and piping plan per project
Insulated chamber for drying under vacuum
Sealing and vacuum stability focused design
Enclosed system space for vacuum oil filling process
Robust frame for LV/HV coil winding applications
Alignment and mechanical repeatability focused structure
